short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your ChatGPT experience with speech-to-text, text-to-speech, and easy chat saving features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Assistant is your ultimate companion for enhancing your chat experience with speech-to-text, text-to-speech, and easy chat saving features. This extension provides tools to convert your speech into text and read text aloud, making interactions more versatile and accessible. Easily save your chat conversations to a text file for future reference. The extension also includes a straightforward registration and settings management system.

Feature listing:
Speech-to-Text: Dictate your prompts and messages, converting your speech into text for hands-free interaction.
Text-to-Speech: Have your text read aloud to you, enhancing accessibility and convenience.
Save Chat to File: Save entire conversation threads to a text file, ensuring you can keep valuable interactions and insights.
Register and Settings: Simple registration and settings management to customize your experience.

Privacy Note:
Privacy is important to us. Although our extension requires certain permissions, ChatGPT Assistant does not read, store, or have access to your browsing history. While our extension can read and modify clipboard data to enhance your user experience, we do not collect or misuse any of this information.

Bug Fixes: SaveAs fixed after ChatGPT changed HTML code. ChatGPT changed the textArea so we fixed F2 and STT.
